titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (SPECIALIST TRAINING) - Description

div.p: TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (SPECIALIST TRAINING) is the same as attribute TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE.

TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (SPECIALIST TRAINING) is the actual date on which an EMPLOYEE successfully completed their Specialist training to QUALIFICATION TYPE National Code 'Certificate of Completion of Training (CCT) - Specialist Training'.
